fields.title: Hard Magic Rules
fields.description: Clearly defined magical laws and mechanics.

fields.title: Forbidden Magic
fields.description: Magic that is dangerous, illegal, or taboo.

fields.title: Skill Leveling
fields.description: Characters gain new abilities and power-ups over time.

fields.title: Dungeons & Boss Battles
fields.description: The story features structured challenges with increasing difficulty.

fields.title: Heavenly Tribulation
fields.description: A powerful breakthrough comes with divine punishment.

fields.title: Immortal Ascension
fields.description: The ultimate goal is achieving godhood.

fields.title: Totalitarian Regime
fields.description: A government that controls all aspects of life.

fields.title: Underground Resistance
fields.description: A hidden group fights against oppression.

fields.title: Mind Games
fields.description: Characters engage in battles of intellect and manipulation.

fields.title: Unreliable Narrator
fields.description: The protagonist's perception of reality is distorted.

fields.title: Unspoken Feelings
fields.description: Characters struggle to confess their emotions.

fields.title: Mutual Pining
fields.description: Both love interests like each other but don't realize it.

fields.title: Resource Scarcity
fields.description: Food, water, or other essentials are extremely limited.

fields.title: Zombie Apocalypse
fields.description: The world is overrun by the undead.

fields.title: Anti-Hero Protagonist
fields.description: The main character has questionable morals.

fields.title: Eldritch Horror
fields.description: Creatures beyond human comprehension appear.

fields.title: Fantasy
fields.description: Stories set in imaginary worlds with magic and mythical creatures.

fields.title: Science Fiction
fields.description: Explores futuristic concepts like space, AI, and time travel.

fields.title: Romance
fields.description: Focuses on love and relationships.

fields.title: Mystery
fields.description: Stories involving crime-solving, suspense, or detective work.

fields.title: Horror
fields.description: Designed to evoke fear, dread, or unease.

fields.title: Historical Fiction
fields.description: Set in the past with real historical events and figures.

fields.title: Slice of Life
fields.description: Focuses on everyday experiences and realistic characters.

fields.title: LitRPG
fields.description: Blends literature and role-playing games with stats and leveling.

fields.title: Dystopian
fields.description: Set in a bleak or ruined future with societal collapse.

fields.title: Isekai
fields.description: Protagonists are transported to another world.

fields.title: Time Paradox
fields.description: Changing the past alters the future unexpectedly.

fields.title: Parallel Worlds
fields.description: Alternate realities exist alongside the main one.

fields.title: Nation Management
fields.description: The protagonist governs a land.

fields.title: Diplomatic Conflict
fields.description: Political struggles between kingdoms.

fields.title: Magic System
fields.description: Defines how magic works in a story.

fields.title: Game Elements
fields.description: The story follows RPG mechanics like levels, stats, dungeons.

fields.title: Cultivation
fields.description: Characters grow stronger by harnessing energy (Qi).

fields.title: Dystopian Society
fields.description: A world with oppressive governments, surveillance, or rebellion themes.

fields.title: Psychological
fields.description: Focuses on mental struggles, mind games, or deep character psychology.

fields.title: Slow Burn
fields.description: Relationships develop gradually, emphasizing character growth.

fields.title: Survival
fields.description: Characters must endure extreme conditions like zombie outbreaks or disasters.

fields.title: Dark Fantasy
fields.description: A fantasy world with grim settings, brutal conflicts, and morally gray characters.

fields.title: Multiple Timelines
fields.description: The narrative switches between different points in time.

fields.title: Kingdom Building
fields.description: The protagonist constructs and governs a territory.
